moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 e5: 2 ... e5, the rarely seen Albin counter gambit.
moves.3. dxe5 d4 4. Nf3 Nc6 5. Nbd2 f6 6. exf6: Black gave up a pawn for rapid development.
moves.9. O-O Nge7 10. Qb3: A good alternative is 10 a3 to enforce b4.
moves.10... Ng6 11. a4 Bb4 12. a5: 12 a5? Pitching a pawn to open lines. Better is 12 h3.
moves.26... Bd5: 26 ... Bd5??? Why did black do this? Moritz must have missed the forced mate 26 ... Qxh2+ 27 Kxh2 Ng4+ 28 Kg1 Nh3+ 29 Kf1 Nh2# -- the killer knight moves.
moves.27. cxd5 Nh3+: Because his attack ran out of steam, black resigned.

gameName: Had a win but didn't see it?
